repository.corpname: Columbia UniversityRare Book and Manuscript Library,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Letters and manuscripts, including correspondence with his publisher, Richard Cobden-Sanderson, and Pauline Francis Stephens, Dorothy Hewlett Kilgour, Norman Kilgour, and Cyril W. Beaumont. The collection also includes the copy of Blunden's "Undertones of War" (London, Cobden-Sanderson, 1928), inscribed to Richard Cobden-Sanderson with a poem, dated 27 July 1929, and containing Blunden's notes, corrections and illustrations throughout.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into 3 series:

acqinfo.head: Acquisition
acqinfo.p: 1973 Letters and manuscripts Friends of the Columbia Libraries Gift

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of specific item; Date (if known); Edmund Blunden Letters and Manuscripts; Box and Folder; Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Columbia University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Blunden's copy of "Undertones of War" is cataloged for the Rare Book collection.
